name: AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension
desc: An object that represents a temporary suspension of coordinated playback.

items.name: struct AVCoordinatedPlaybackSuspension.Reason
items.desc: Constants that identify playback suspension reasons.

items.name: func end(proposingNewTime: CMTime)
items.desc: Ends a suspension and proposes a new playback time to the group.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a suspension with a string.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a suspension with a raw string value.
